page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-2014: View a 2014 blog post detailing proof of stake
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-2021: View a 2021 blog post on the Ethereum roadmap evolution
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-2022: View a 2022 blog post: The Hitchhikers Guide to Ethereum
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-2021-updates: View a 2021 blog post on the Ethereum Protocol Updates
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-desc-1: Ethereum needs to reduce network congestion and improve speeds to better service a global user base.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-desc-2: Running a node is getting harder as the network grows. This will only get harder with efforts to scale the network.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-desc-3: Ethereum uses too much electricity. The technology that keeps the network secure needs to be more sustainable.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-future: A digital future on a global scale
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-meta-desc: An overview of the impact upgrades will have on Ethereum, and the challenges they must overcome.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-scalability-desc: Ethereum needs to be able to handle more transactions per second without increasing the size of the nodes in the network. Nodes are vital network participants who store and run the blockchain. Increasing node size isn't practical because only those with powerful and expensive computers could do it. To scale, Ethereum needs more transactions per second, coupled with more nodes. More nodes means more security.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-scalability-desc-3: Layer 2 rollups scale Ethereum by moving transactions offchain and only posting summary data to Ethereum. This batching increases Ethereum's throughput while drastically reducing costs for users.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-scalability-desc-4: Rollups need low-cost storage on layer 1 to make transactions as cheap as possible for users. This will be provided in the form of blobs attached to Ethereum blocks. Eventually, many blobs will be attached to Ethereum blocks, providing cheap storage for many rollups.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-security-desc: The planned upgrades improve Ethereum's security against coordinated attacks.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-security-desc-3: In proof-of-stake additional security comes from greater crypto-economic disincentives against attack. This is because, in proof-of-stake, the validators who secure the network must stake significant amounts of ETH into the protocol. If they try and attack the network, the protocol can automatically destroy their ETH.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-security-desc-5: However, it is also important that upgrades that protect validators against denial-of-service attacks, enhance their anonymity, and separate block building and block propagation are implemented soon. These upgrades protect individual validators and the network as a whole against liveness attacks and censorship.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-security-desc-10: Staking also means you don't need to invest in elite hardware to participate directly in consensus. This should encourage more people to become a validator, increasing the network's decentralization and decreasing the attack surface area.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-security-validator: You can become a validator by staking your ETH.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-subtitle: Grow Ethereum until it's powerful enough to help all of humanity.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-sustainability-desc-: Ethereum is now a green blockchain. The energy consumption was reduced by ~99.95% when proof-of-work was swapped for proof-of-stake.
Ethereum is now secured via staking, not computing power.

This sustainability boost also brings security benefits - staked ether makes it much more expensive to attack the chain than under proof-of-work, but less expensive to secure it as less new ETH has to be issued to pay validators than miners.
The move to proof-of-stake made Ethereum greener and more secure. It is a low-carbon platform for building apps and organizations.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-sustainability-subti: Ethereum is a green blockchain with strong crypto-economic security.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-cardtext-1: Ethereum upgrades will make Ethereum scalable, secure, and decentralized. Staking has lowered the barrier to participation and limited economies-of-scale, creating a larger - more decentralized - network.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-cardtext-2: Secure and decentralized blockchain networks require every node to verify every transaction processed by the chain. This amount of work limits the number of transactions that can happen at any one given time. Decentralized and secure reflects the Ethereum chain today.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-cardtext-3: Decentralized networks work by sending information about transactions across nodes - the whole network needs to know about any state change. Scaling transactions per second across a decentralized network poses security risks because the more transactions, the longer the delay, the higher the probability of attack while information is in flight.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-cardtext-4: Increasing the size and power of Ethereum's nodes could increase transactions per second in a secure way, but the hardware requirement would restrict who could do it - this threatens decentralization. It's hoped that sharding and proof-of-stake will allow Ethereum to scale by increasing the amount of nodes, not node size.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-modal-tip: Tap the circles below to better understand the problems of decentralized scaling
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-p: A naive way to solve Ethereum's problems would be to make it more centralized. But decentralization is too important. It's decentralization that gives Ethereum neutrality, censorship resistance, openness, data ownership and near-unbreakable security.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-p-1: Ethereum's vision is to be more scalable and secure, but also to remain decentralized. Achieving these 3 qualities is a problem known as the scalability trilemma.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-p-2: Ethereum upgrades aim to solve the trilemma but there are significant challenges.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-press-butto: Press the buttons on the triangle to better understand the problems of decentralized scaling.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-upgrade-needs-desc: The Ethereum protocol that launched in 2015 has had incredible success. But the Ethereum community always expected that a few key upgrades would be necessary to unlock Ethereum's full potential.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-upgrade-needs-desc-2: High demand is driving up transaction fees that make Ethereum expensive for the average user. The disk space needed to run an Ethereum client is growing at a fast rate.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-upgrade-needs-desc-3: Ethereum has a set of upgrades that address these problems and more. This set of upgrades was originally called 'Serenity' and 'Eth2,' and they've been an active area of research and development since 2014.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-upgrade-needs-desc-5: Now that the technology is ready, these upgrades will re-architect Ethereum to make it more scalable, secure, and sustainable - to make life better for existing users and entice new ones. All while preserving Ethereum's core value of decentralization.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-upgrade-needs-desc-6: This means there's no on-switch for scalability. Improvements will ship incrementally over time.

page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-build-your-own-ssd-note: SSD ṣe pàtàkì fún àwọn ìyára kíkọ tí a béèrè.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-build-your-own-nuc: Intel NUC, gen ìkẹ́jẹ tàbí kó ja julo
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-build-your-own-connectio: Ko pọn dandan, ṣùgbọ́n ó ń pèsè ìṣètò tó rọrùn àti ìsopọ̀ tó dúró déédéé
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-build-your-own-periphera: Àyàfi tí ó bá ń lọ DAppNode, tàbí ssh/ìṣètò aláìlórí
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-build-your-own-software-: Tí ó bá ti ṣe tán pẹ̀lú ìṣètò ẹ̀rọ rẹ, ètò ìmúṣiṣẹ́ DAppNode wá láti gba sì orí kọ̀ǹpútà rẹ àti sí orí SSD titun pelu USB.
Fún ìṣàkóso tótó, àwọn olúmùlò tí wọn ní ìrírí lè feran láti lọ láìní àṣẹ.
Wo àwọn ìwé olùgbéejáde fún àlàyé síwájú sí i lórí bíbẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú yíyàn oníbàárà.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-buy-fully-loaded-descrip: Ra ẹ̀rọ amúṣẹ́yá lọ́wọ́ àwọn òǹtajà fún ìrírí ìmúniwọlé tó rọrùn.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-buy-fully-loaded-note-2: Ètò àfojúrí pẹ̀lú ìfihàn àsopọ̀ aláwòrán.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-censorship-resistance-pr: Ṣe àrídájú ìráàyè wọlé sí nígbà tí ó nílò rẹ̀, kí o sì má jẹ́ ìfòfinde.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-censorship-resistance-1: Nódù ẹni kẹta lè pinnu láti kọ ìdúnàdúrà láti àwọn àdírẹ́sì IP kan ni pàtó, tàbí ìdúnàdúrà tó níṣe pẹ̀lú àkáǹtì kọ̀ọ̀kan, tí yóò sì ti ibẹ̀ fa ìdènà láti lo nẹ́tíwọ̀kì náà nígbà tí o bá nílò rẹ̀.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-censorship-resistance-2: Níní nòódu tirẹ lati fi idunadura sọwọ lati jẹ ìdánílójú pe o le tan kari idunadura rọ si nẹtiwọọki ẹlẹ́gbẹ́-sí-ẹlẹ́gbẹ́ yoku ní ìgbàkigbà.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-community-description-1: Ojú opo ayẹ́lujára bíi Discord tàbí Reddit jẹ ilẹ́ fún òpò àwọn olùṣeda awujo tí wọ ń fẹ lati ran o lọwọ́ pẹ̀lú eyikeyi idojukọ tí o ní.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-community-description-2: Máṣe dàáṣe. Tí o ba ní ìbeere o ṣee ṣe kí ẹnìkan fún o ní èsì níbi.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-choose-your-adventure-1: Òó nilo àwọn ẹ̀rọ lati bẹ̀rẹ̀. O ṣeeṣe ki o lo afilọlẹ nóòdu lori komputa rẹ ṣugbọn lilo ẹ̀rọ ifaraji yoo daaju fún nóòdu rẹ ti ipa re yoo si kéré lori komputa ara ẹni rẹ.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-choose-your-adventure-2: Nigbati o ba ń mú ẹ̀rọ, rípe ṣéèni na ń gboro si ti yóò si nilo atunṣe orekóóre. Ìgbéga àwọn ẹ̀yà ṣì lè ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ ìdádúró ìwúlò fún ìtọ́jú nódù.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-choose-your-adventure-bu: Àṣayan olówó pọku ati alàdáni fún àwọn olumulo akọṣemọṣẹ.
Tabi, mú OS rẹ àti àwọn onibáàra rẹ.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-decentralized-1: Àwọn olùpín òfurufú àárin le pese agbara iṣisẹ to pọ, ṣùgbọ́n wọn maa ń pese afojusún fún àwọn onikọlú tí wọn n wa lati da netiwọọki rú.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-decentralized-2: Idúróṣinṣin netiwọọki ṣee ṣe nípa nóòdu pupọ sii, ní agbegbe to ṣe ọtọ̀ọ́to, lilo pèlú àwọn èniyan tí orisun wọn yàtọ̀. Bí àwọn olùlo nóòdu ṣe pọ sí, igbekele ikuna ojukán kere sí, tí netiwọọki naa yoo gbopọn si.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-further-reading-1-link: Mímọ́ Ẹ́tẹ́ríómù - Ńjẹ kí n lo Nóòdu kikún
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-further-reading-2-link: Ẹ́tẹ́ríómù lorí ARM - Ìtọna ati Bẹ̀rẹ̀ Ní Kíákíá
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-getting-started-software: Nì àwọn ọjọ́ ibẹ̀rẹ̀ nẹtiwọọki, olúṣamulo nílo lati ni ibaṣepọ pèlú ìlà-kọmandi lati le lo nóòdu Ẹ́téríómù kán.
Tí eyi bajẹ ifẹran rẹ, tí osi ni ìmọ̀ rẹ, yẹ àwọn iwé ikọṣemọse wa wò.
Bayìí a ní NóòduDApp, tí o je sọftiwìá ọfẹ to ṣi silẹ o sí fún àwọn aṣamulo ní irírí afilọlẹ nigbati wọn ba ń ṣe akoso nóòdu wọn.
Pèlú itẹ ni wọnba, o le ṣeda nóòdu rẹ tí yoo sì mọ ṣiṣẹ.

DAppNode jẹ kí o rọrún fún àwọn aṣamulo lati lo nóòdu kikún, ati dapps ati àwọn nẹtiwọọki P2P, lai nilo ìlà-komandi. Eyi jọ kí o rorún fún gbogbo ènìyan lati kopa ati ṣeda nẹtiwọọki ti alailakoso dáàda.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-hero-header:
Ṣe akoso ni kikún.
Ṣe nóòdu rẹ fúnra rẹ.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-hero-subtitle: Dí aláṣẹ kikún pèlú didàbo bo nẹtiwọọki. Di Ẹ́tẹ́ríọ́mù.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-install-manually-1: Tí o ba jẹ olúmulo akoṣẹmoṣẹ tì o si tí pinnu lati ṣeda ẹ̀rọ tirẹ, DAppNode le di gbigba kale lati ori eyikeyi komputa sínú SSD titún pèlú USB drive.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-meta-description: Ọ̀rọ̀ iṣaaju lori bawo, ìdí ati bí a ti n lo nóòdu Ẹ́téríọ́mù.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-participate-1: Nipasẹ lilo nóòdu, o ti darapọ mọ ètò agbayẹ fún idaduro akoso ati agbára lori aye ti ọ̀rọ̀.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-participate-2: Tí o ba je oludimu, mú iwulo ba ETH rẹ nipasẹ àtìleyín fún ilera ati idaduro nẹtiwọọọki ki o sí ri pẹ oni ípa ninu ọjọ iwaaju rẹ̀.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-privacy-preview: Dẹkun fifi àwọn alaye nipa rẹ fún awon nóòdu ẹlẹgbẹ-kẹta.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-privacy-1: Nigbatí o ba ń dunadura pẹ̀lú nóòdu ita gbangba, àwọn alaye nípa rẹ lẹ jo si ọdọ àwọn olupese ẹlẹ́gbẹ-kẹta bí adìírẹsi IP ati adìirẹsí Ẹ́tẹ́ríọ́mù ti o ni.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-privacy-2: Nipasẹ lilo wọleeti to yẹ pèlú nóòdu rẹ, o le lo wọlẹẹti rẹ lati ṣe ibaṣepọ pèlú blockchain ní aṣiri ati ààbo.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-privacy-3: Bakan naa, tí nóòdu alarún kan ba pin ìṣowo aikotọ, nóòdu rẹ yóò dena rẹ. Gbogbo idunadura  ní o ma ń ṣaridaju lori ẹrọ rẹ, pèlú idi eyi o nilo lati fọkantan ènikeni.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-rasp-pi-description: Àwọn Raspberry Pi fuyẹ wọn sí jẹ komputa tí ko gunpa, ṣugbọn wọ ni opin sí ipa ti wọn le ṣe fún ise nóòdu rẹ. Botilẹjẹpẹ wọn o ṣe gbara le fún idokowo, wọn jẹ aṣayan to tayọ ti kosí wọn fún nóòdu ti ara eni, pèlú RAM láàrin mẹrin sí mẹjọ.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-rasp-pi-note-2-descripti: Kọ lati ṣeto nóòdu pèlú ìlà-kọmandi lori Raspbery Pi
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-rasp-pi-note-3-descripti: Tẹlẹ nibí toba jẹ pẹ àwọn ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ lo nifẹ si
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-staking-description: Botilẹjẹpẹ ko pọn dandan, pèlú lilo nóòdu o tí súnmọ didokòwò pèlú ETH rẹ lati jẹ èrè bakan naa ati lọwọsi ẹka ọ̀tọ̀ ti ààbo Ẹ́tẹ́ríọ́mù.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-staking-plans-title: O ń gbero lati dokowò bí?
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-staking-plans-descriptio: Lati ṣe ijafafa olusayẹwo rẹ ní kikun, o nilo o kere ju RAM mẹẹdogun gigabaiti, ṣugbọn mejilelọgbọn yóò dara ju lo, pèlú CPU 6667+ lori cpubenchmark.net. A tún dábàá pé kí àwọn olùdókòwò ní àǹfààní láti lo ìkànnì íńtánẹ́ẹ̀tì alágbàrá tí kò ní ààlà, bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé ko pọn dandan.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-staking-plans-ethstaker-: Bi a ti n ra ẹ̀rọ oluṣayẹwo Ẹ́tẹ́ríọ́mù
EthStaker ṣàlàyé lẹ́kúnrẹ́rẹ́ nínú ètò oní wákàtí kan yìí
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-sovereignty-preview: Ṣé o ń rò wípé kí ó lo nódù bíi ìgbésẹ̀ tó kọjá gbígba wọ́lẹ́ẹ́tì Ethereum tìrẹ.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-sovereignty-1: Wọlẹẹti Ẹ́tẹ́ríọ́mù jẹ ki o ni akoso kikun lori dúkìa digitali rẹ nipasẹ nini kọ́kọ́rọ́ igbaniwọlẹ aṣiri sí àwọn adiresi rẹ ṣugbọ́n àwọn kọ́kọ́rọ́ naa kole sọ ipo blockchian lọwọlọwọ fún iwo bí iye tò ku ninu wọlẹẹti rẹ.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-sovereignty-2: Boṣe wa tẹlẹ, wọlẹẹti Ẹ́tẹ́ríọ́mù kan si nóòdu ẹlẹgbẹ-kẹta bì Infura tabi Alchemy, nigbati o ba ǹ wo owo re to ku. Lilo nóòdu tirẹ yóò gba ọ laayẹ lati ní ẹda blockchain Ẹ́tẹ́ríọ́mù tirẹ.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-meta-title: How to Run an Ethereum Node
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-voice-your-choice-previe: Má ṣe fi ìṣàkóso sílẹ̀ ní ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ti ìpín.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-voice-your-choice-1: Nì iṣẹlẹ ti ìpín ṣéènì, nibiti ṣeeni meji ti dapọ pèlú ilana otọọtọ, lilo nóòdu tirẹ fún o ni idaniloju lati mú ilana ti o fẹ ṣàtìlẹyìn fún. O wa ku si o lowo lati ṣe agbega sí ìlànà titún tabi gbero ayipada tabi rara.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-voice-your-choice-2: Tí o ba ń fí ETH dokowò, lilo nóòdu tirẹ yóò fún ọ ní anfáàni lati yán onibaara tóbá wu ọ, lati le ṣe idin kún ewu gige àti híhuwà sí ilọsokesilẹ nẹtiwọọki bí àkókò ti ń lọ. Didokowò pèlú olupese ẹlẹgbẹ-kẹta tí yọ anfàáni lati mú onibaara to wú o.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-what-title: ki ni ṣe o tumọ si "lilo nóòdu"?
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-what-1-text: Tí a mọ sí 'onibaara', softiwia yí yoo ṣe igbasile ẹda blockchain Ethereum yoo sitún ṣe idanilojú ífẹsẹmulẹ gbogbo bulọọku, yòó tún ṣe imudojuiwon rẹ pèlú awon bulọọku tuntun ati àwọn idunadura, yòó tún ran awọn yòóku lọwọ lati ṣe igbasile ati imudojuiwon ẹda ti wọn naa.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-what-2-text: A ṣe Ethereum lati ṣisẹ nóòdu lori awọn kọmputa olumulo apapọ. O le lo komputa aladani ṣùgbọ́n ọpọlọpọ olumulo ma ń lo komputa aladanla fún ija gèére iṣẹ nóòdu.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-what-3-subtitle: Nigbati o ba wà lórí ayélujára.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-what-3-text: Lilo nóòdu Ẹ́tẹ́ríọ́mù le ṣòro ní akọkọ, ṣùgbọ́n o kan jẹ lilo softiwia onibáàra ni lemọlemọ pèlú wíwà lojú opo intanẹẹti. Tí o ko ba sí ní oju-opo, nóòdu yòó wa ni aiṣiṣẹ títí yoo fí pada si oju-opo, yòó sí gba àwọn iyàtọ titún to ba wa.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-who-preview: Gbo èniyan! Nóòdu ko kan wa fún àwọn oluṣayẹwo ẹ̀rí ìdókòwò. Ènikèni le lo nóòdu - koda o ko nilo lati ní ETH.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-who-copy-1: Ó kò ni lati fí ETH dokowò ki o to le lo nóòdu. Kódà, gbogbo nóòdu miiran lori Ẹ́tẹ́ríọ́mù ní àwọn oluṣayẹwo a se iṣiro fún.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-who-copy-2: O lè ma gba èrè oni owó tí àwọn oluṣayẹwo gba, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn èrè miiran wa pèlú lilo nóòdu fún oluṣamulo Ẹ́tẹ́ríọ́mù to ni lati gbeyewo, to pelu aṣiri, ààbo, idinkún gbigbarale àwọn olupín ẹlẹ́gbẹ́-kẹta, títako ifòfinde ìlera to dára síi àti ṣíṣe aláìlákóso nẹ́tíwọọkì.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-who-copy-3: Níní nóòdu tirẹ túnmọ sí pe ó kò nilo lati fí alaye síta nipa ipo nẹtiwọọki tí olupin ẹlẹ́gbẹ́-keta pese.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-why-title: Ìdí tí a fí n lo nóòdu?

page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-borrow-crypto: Pẹ̀lú Ethereum o lè yáwó ní tààràtà látọ̀dọ̀ àwọn olùṣàmúlò míràn láìsí pé o fi ETH rẹ ṣòwò. Èyí lè fún ọ ní agbára díẹ̀ nínú àwọn ṣe èyí láti gbìyànjú láti ṣa ETH díẹ̀ síi jọ.

Àmọ́ nítorí pé owó ETH kì í dúró sójú kan, o ní láti ṣe àfikún ìpamọ́. Ìyẹn túmọ̀ sí pé tí o bá fẹ́ yá 100 stablecoins, ó ṣeé ṣe kó o nílò ETH tó tó $150 ó kéré tán. Èyí á dáàbò bo ètò ìṣúnná owó náà àti àwọn tó ń yáwó náà.
Díẹ̀ síi lórí àwọn stablecoins tó ní àtìlẹyìn crypto
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-borrow-places: Àwọn dapps wọ̀nyí jẹ́ kí o yá stablecoins nípa lílo crypto gẹ́gẹ́ bí ohun ìṣedúró. Àwọn mìíràn gba àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n àti ETH.
Àwọn ibi tí o ti lè yá stablecoins
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-borrow-requir: Ìwọ yóò nílò wọ́lẹ́ẹ́tì láti lo dapp kan
Ìwọ yóò nílò ETH fún ohun iṣedúró àti/tàbí àwọn ìdíyelé ìdúnàádúrà
Láti yá stablecoins ìwọ yóò nílò láti lo dapp tó tọ́. Ìwọ yóò tún nílò wọ́lẹ́ẹ́tì àti díẹ̀ nínú ETH.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-borrow-risks-: Tí o bá lo ETH gẹ́gẹ́ bíi ohun iṣedúró, tí iye owó rẹ sì já wálẹ̀, ohun iṣedúró rẹ kò ní kájú stablecoins tí o ṣẹ̀dá ni rẹ̀. Èyí yóò mú kí ETH rẹ jáwá sílẹ̀ àti pé o lè kojú ìjìyà kan. Nítorí náà, tí o bá yá stablecoins, ìwọ yóò nílò láti ṣọ iye owó ETH.
Iye owó ETH tó ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ jáde
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-borrow-text-p: O lè yáwó díẹ̀ nínú àwọn stablecoins nípa lílo crypto bíi ohun iṣedúró, èyí tí o ní láti san padà.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-buy-requireme: Ṣàyẹwò àwọn iṣẹ́ tí o lè lò gẹ́gẹ́ níbi tí ò ń gbé

Àkántì kan pẹ̀lú paṣípáàrọ̀ tàbí wọ́lẹ́ẹ́tì tí o ti lè ra crypto ní tààrà. O lè ti lo ọ̀kan tẹ́lẹ̀ láti gba díẹ̀ nínú ETH. Ṣàyẹ̀wò láti wo irú àwọn iṣẹ́ tí o lè lò níbi tí o ń gbé. Iwe akọọlẹ kan pẹlu paṣipaarọ tabi apamọwọ o le ra crypto lati taara. O le ti lo ọkan tẹlẹ lati gba diẹ ninu ETH. Ṣayẹwo lati wo iru awọn iṣẹ ti o le lo nibiti o ngbe.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-buy-text-prev: Púpọ̀ ti àwọn pàṣípáàrọ̀ àti àwọn wọ́lẹ́ẹ́tì jẹ́ kí o ra stablecoins ní tààrà. Àwọn ìdíwọ́ agbègbè yóò wáyé.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-buy-warning: Àwọn pàṣípáàrọ̀ alákóso lè ṣe àtòjọ àwọn stablecoins bíi USDC, Tether, àti àwọn mìíràn nìkan tó ní àtìlẹyìn owó bébà. O lè má ní àǹfààní láti rà wọ́n tààrà, ṣùgbọ́n ó yẹ kí o ní àǹfààní láti ṣe pàṣípáàrọ̀ wọn láti ETH tàbí àwọn owó crypto mìíràn tí o lè rà lórí pẹpẹ.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-earn-project-: Púpọ̀ jùlọ iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ fún ìṣípòpadà sọfitiwia orísun gbangba.
Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ, àkóónú, àti iṣẹ́ mìíràn fún àwùjọ MakerDao (ẹgbẹ́ tó mú Dai wá fún ọ).
Nígbà tí o bá mọ nǹkan rẹ ga-an, wá àwọn àṣìṣe ẹ̀rọ láti jèrè Dai.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-earn-projects: Àwọn pẹpẹ yìí ni yóò sanwó fún ọ ní stablecoins fún iṣẹ́ rẹ.
Ibi tí o ti lè jèrè àwọn stablecoins
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-earn-requirem: Ìwọ yóò nílò wọ́lẹ́ẹ́tì kan láti gba stablecoins tí o jèrè
Stablecoins jẹ́ ọ̀nà dídára láti sanwó fún iṣẹ́ nítorí pé iye wọn dúró sán-ún. Ṣùgbọ́n o nílò wọ́lẹ́ẹ́tì kan láti fi sanwó.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-earn-text-pre: O lè jèrè stablecoins nípa ṣíṣe iṣẹ́ lórí àwọn àkànṣe iṣẹ́ nínú àyíká Ethereum.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-swap-dapp-int: Tí o bá ti ní ETH àti wọ́lẹ́ẹ́tì, kan tẹ́lẹ̀, o lè lo àwọn dapps wọ̀nyí láti ṣe pàṣípáàrọ̀ fún stablecoins.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-swap-dapp-lin: Díẹ̀ síi lórí àwọn pàṣípáàrọ̀ aláìlákóso
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-swap-editors-: Gba wọ́lẹ́ẹ́tì kan tí yóò jẹ́ kí o ra ETH kí o sì pààrọ̀ rẹ̀ fún àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n, títí kan stablecoins ní tààràtà.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-swap-requirem: Ìwọ yóò nílò wọ́lẹ́ẹ́tì láti fọwọ́sí pàṣípáàrọ̀ náà àti láti tọ́jú owó rẹ
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-swap-text-pre: O lè mú stablecoins tó pọ̀ jù lọ lórí àwọn pàṣípààrọ̀ aláìlákóso. Nítorí náà, o lè pààrọ̀ àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n èyíkéyìí tí o lè ní fún stablecoin tí o fẹ́.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-algorithmic-con-1: O nílò láti gbẹ́kẹ̀lé (tàbí ní àǹfààní láti ka) alugọ́rídíìmù náà.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-algorithmic-con-2: Ìṣírò owó ẹyọ rẹ yóò yí padà èyí tó dá lórí ìpèsè lápapọ̀.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-algorithmic-description: Awọn stablecoins wọ̀nyí kò ní àtìlẹyìn nípasẹ̀ èyíkéyìí dúkìá mìíràn. Dípò alugoridimu. kan yóò ta àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n tí ìdíyelé bá wálẹ̀ ju iye tí o fẹ́ àti àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n ìpèsè tí iye náà bá kọjá iye tí o fẹ́. Nítorí pé iye àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n wọ̀nyí tó wà ní káàkiri ń yípadà nígbà gbogbo, iye àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n tí o ní yóò yípadà, ṣùgbọ́n yóò ṣe àfihàn ìpín rẹ nígbà gbogbo.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-algorithmic-disclaimer: Àwọn stablecoin alugorítìmí ni ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ìdánwò. Ó yẹ kí o mọ àwọn ewu ṣáájú lílo wọn.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-bank-apy-source: Ìpíndọ́gba owó tí àwọn báńkì ń san lórí àwọn àkántì ìpìlẹ̀ ìpamọ́ tí ìjọba àpapọ̀ fi ààbò bo ti Orílẹ̀-èdè Amẹ́ríkà.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-bitcoin-pizza-body: Ní ọdún 2010, ẹnìkan ra pizzà méjì fún 10,000 bitcoin. Ní àkókò ti àwọn wọ̀nyí ní ó tó ~ $ 41 USD. Ní ọjà òde òní, èyí tó àwọn mílíọ̀nù dọ́là. Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ irú àwọn ìdúnàádúrà tí a kábàámọ̀ fún ló wà nínú ìtàn Ethereum. Àwọn stablecoin yanjú ìṣòro yìí, nítorí náà o lè gbádùn pizza rẹ kó o sì di ETH rẹ mú.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-con-1: Kò dúró sán-ún bíi àwọn stablecoin tí wọ́n ń fi owó ṣe àtìlẹyìn.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-con-2: O ní láti máa ṣọ́ iye owó tí wọ́n fi ṣe ohun ìṣèdúró crypto.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-descripti: Awọn stablecoins wọ̀nyí ní àtìlẹyìn nípasẹ̀ àwọn ohun-ìní crypto mìíràn, bíi ETH. Iye wọn dá lórí iye ti dúkìá abẹ́lẹ̀ (tàbí ohun ìṣèdúró), èyí tó lè jẹ́ ìyípadà. Nítorí pé iye ETH lè yípadà, àwọn stablecoins wọ̀nyí ni ó ní ohun ìṣèdúró púpọ̀ láti ríi dájú pé ìdíyelé náà wà ní ìdúróṣinṣin bó ti ṣeé ṣe. Èyí túmọ̀ sí pé ó súnmọ́ láti sọ wípé stablecoin tó ní àtìlẹyìn crypto dọ́là kan ní ohun ìní crypto abẹ́lẹ̀ tó ní iye tó kéré tán $2. Nítorí náà, bí owó ETH bá lọ sílẹ̀, ETH púpọ̀ sí i ni a gbọ́dọ̀ lò láti ṣe àtìlẹyìn fún stablecoin, bí bẹ́ẹ̀ kọ́, àwọn stablecoin náà yóò pàdánù iye wọn.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-pro-1: Ṣe kedere, àti aláìlákóso ní kíkún.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-pro-2: Ìyára láti yí padà sí àwọn ohun ìní crypto mìíràn.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-pro-3: Kò sí àwọn olùtọ́jú ìta – gbogbo àwọn ohun-ìní ní ìṣàkóso nípasẹ̀ àwọn àkántì Ethereum.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-dai-banner-body: Dai ni ó ṣeé ṣe kí ó jẹ́ olókìkí stablecoin aláìlákóso jù lọ. Iye rẹ jẹ́ bíi dọ́là kan àti pé wọ́n gbà á káàkiri dapps.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-editors-choice-intro: Ìwọ̀nyí jẹ́ àwọn àpẹẹrẹ tí a mọ̀ jùlọ ti àwọn stablecoins ní báyìí àti àwọn owó tí a ti rí ìwúlò wọn nígbà tí a bá ń lo dapps.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-fiat-backed-con-1: Tó ní àkóso - ẹnìkan gbọdọ̀ fúnni ní àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n náà.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-fiat-backed-con-2: Ó nílò àyẹ̀wò láti ríi dájú pé ilé-iṣẹ́ ní àwọn ifìṣúra tó tó.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-fiat-backed-description: Ní pàtàkì IOU (Mo jẹ ọ́ ní gbèsè) fún owó bébà (nígbà gbogbo dọ́là). O lo owó bébà rẹ láti ra stablecoin tí o lè fi ra owó tó bá yá àti fi ṣe ìràpadà owó dígítà rẹ.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-fiat-backed-pro-2: Ìyípadà nínú iye owó kò tó nǹkan.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-find-stablecoin-how-to-: Bí o ṣe lè gba stablecoins
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-find-stablecoin-intro: Ọgọgọ́ọ́rún stablecoins ló wà lárọ̀ọ́wọ́tó. Èyí ni díè nínú wọn láti ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún ọ láti bẹ̀rẹ̀. Bí o bá jẹ́ ẹni tuntun sí Ethereum, a dábàá pé kí o ṣe ìwádìí díẹ̀ lákọ̀ọ́kọ́.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-get-stablecoins: Bí o ṣe lè gba stablecoins
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-hero-alt: Àwọn stablecoins mẹ́ta tó tóbi jù lọ nípasẹ̀ iye ọjà: Dai, USDC, àti Tether.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-hero-subtitle: Stablecoins jẹ́ àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n Ethereum tí a ṣe láti dúró ní iye tó wà títí, pàápàá nígbàtí ìdíyelé ti ETH bá yípadà.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-meta-description: Ìfihàn sí Ethereum stablecoins: kíni wọ́n jẹ́, bí o ṣe lè gbà wọ́n, àti ìdí tí wọ́n fi ṣe pàtàkì.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-precious-metals-con-1: Tó ní àkóso - ẹnìkan gbọdọ̀ fúnni ní àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n náà.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-precious-metals-con-2: O ní láti gbẹ́kẹ̀lé olùfúnni ní tọ́kẹ̀n àti àwọn ìfipamọ́ irin iyebíye.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-precious-metals-descrip: Bíi awọn owó tó ní àtìlẹyìn owó bébà, àwọn stablecoin yìí máa ń lo àwọn ohun àmúṣọrọ̀ bíi wúrà láti mú kí ìníyelórí wọn wà.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-prices-definition: Stablecoins jẹ́ àwọn owó crypto tí kò ní àyípadà. Wọ́n ní ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn agbára kan náà bíi ETH ṣùgbọ́n iye wọn jẹ́ ìdúróṣinṣin díẹ̀ síi bíi owó ìbílẹ̀. Nítorí náà o ní ààyè sí owó tí ó dúró sán-ún tí o lè lò lórí Ethereum.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-prices-definition-how: Bí àwọn stablecoin ṣe gba ìdúróṣinṣin wọn
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-research-warning: Ethereum jẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tuntun àti pé ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ohun èlò jẹ tuntun. Ríi dájú pé o mọ ewu tó wà nínú rẹ̀, kí o sì máa fi kìkì ohun tí o lè pàdánù sínú rẹ̀.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-research-warning-title: Ṣe ìwádìí ti ara rẹ nígbà gbogbo
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-save-stablecoins-body: Àwọn stablecoin máa ń ní iye owó èlé tó ga ju àpapọ̀ lọ nítorí ìbéèrè púpọ̀ wà fún yíyá wọn. Àwọn dapps wà tó jẹ́ kí o lè gba èlé lórí àwọn stablecoins rẹ ní àkókò gidi nípa fífi wọn sínú àgbá tó ń yáwó. Gẹ́gẹ́ bíi àgbáyé ilé-ìfowópamọ́, o ń pèsè àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n fún àwọn olùyáwó ṣùgbọ́n o lè yọ àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n rẹ kúrò àti èlé rẹ nígbàkigbà.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-saving: Lo owó ìpamọ́ stablecoin dáadáa, kó o sì rí èlé gbà. Bíi ti ohun gbogbo tó wà nínú crypto, Àwọn ìkórè Ọdọọdún ti àsọtẹ́lẹ̀ (APY) lè yí padà láti ọjọ́ kan sí òmíràn tó dá lórí ìpèsè/ìbéèrè ní àkókò gidi.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-stablecoins-dapp-callou: Ṣàyẹ̀wò àwọn dapps Ethereum - stablecoins nígbà gbogbo wúlò díẹ̀ síi fún àwọn ìdúnàádúrà ojoojúmọ́.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-stablecoins-dapp-descri: Àwọn ọjà fún ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ stablecoins, pẹ̀lú Dai, USDC, TUSD, USDT, àti síwájú síi.
Yá ni ní stablecoins kí o si gba èlé àti $COMP, tọ́kẹ̀n ti Compound.
Pẹpẹ ìdúnàádúrà tí o ti lè rí èlé lórí Dai àti USDC rẹ.
Ohun èlò kan tí wọ́n ṣe láti fi ṣe àfipamọ́ Dai.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-stablecoins-feature-1: Stablecoins jé nǹkan tó káàkiri àgbáyé, ọ sì lè fi ránṣẹ́ lórí ayélujára. Ọ rọrùn láti gbà tàbí fi ránṣẹ́ tí ọ bá ní àkántì Ethereum.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-stablecoins-feature-2: Ìbéèrè fún stablecoins ga, nítorí náà o lè rí èlé gbà tí o bá yá ni a lówó rẹ. Ríi dájú pé o mọ àwọn ewu tó wà níbẹ̀ kó o tó yá ni lówó.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-stablecoins-feature-3: Wón lè fí stablecoins pààrọ̀ ETH àti àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n Ethereum. Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ dapps gbára lé stablecoins.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-stablecoins-feature-4: Stablecoins ní àabò tó péye pẹ̀lú cryptography . Kòsí ẹnikẹ́ni tó lè fi owó ránṣẹ́ léyìn rè.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-stablecoins-meta-descri: Ìfihàn sí Ethereum stablecoins: kíni wọ́n jẹ́, bí o ṣe lè gbà wọ́n, àti ìdí tí wọ́n fi ṣe pàtàkì.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-table-error: Kò le ṣe àgbésílẹ̀ stablecoins. Gbìyànjú láti sọ ojú-ìwé dọtun padà.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-meta-title: Stablecoins explained: What are they for?
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-top-coins: Àwọn stablecoin tó ga jùlọ nípasẹ̀ gbogbo owó ọjà
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-top-coins-intro-code: iye ti gbogbo awọn tọ́kẹ̀n tó wà ní ìlọ́po nípasẹ̀ iye fún tọ́kẹ̀n kan. Àtòjọ yìí jẹ àyípadà àti àwọn iṣẹ́ àkànṣe tí a ṣe àtòjọ níbí kò ní láti jẹ́ èyí tí ẹgbẹ́ ethereum.org fọwọ́ sí.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-types-of-stablecoin: Bí wọ́n ṣe ń ṣiṣẹ́: oríṣi stablecoin
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-usdc-banner-body: USDC ni ó ṣeé ṣe ni stablecoin olókìkí jùlọ tó ní àtìlẹyìn owó bébà. Iye rẹ jẹ́ bíi dọ́là kan àti pé o ní àtìlẹyìn nípasẹ̀ Circle àti Coinbase.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-why-stablecoins: Kí nìdí tó fi jẹ́ stablecoins?
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-how-they-work-button: Báwo ni wọ́n ṣe ń ṣiṣẹ́
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-why-stablecoins-body: ETH, bíi Bitcoin, ní iye owó tí kò dúró sójú kan nítorí pé ó jẹ́ ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé. Nítorí náà, o lè máà fẹ́ máa lò ó déédéé. Stablecoins ṣe àfihàn iye ti àwọn owó níná ìbílẹ̀ láti fún ọ ní ààyè sí stablecoin tí o lè lò lórí Ethereum.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-tools-title: Kọ́ ẹ̀kọ́ díẹ̀ síi nípa stablecoins
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-tools-stablecoinswtf-de: Stablecoins.wtf ń fúnni ní dáṣíbọ́ọ̀dù pẹ̀lú àwọn dátà ìtàn ọjà, àwọn ìṣirò, àti àkóónú ẹ̀kọ́ fún àwọn stablecoins olókìkí jùlọ.

page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-address-ca: A ti ṣafikun awọn aaye lati jẹ ki adirẹsi naa rọrun lati ka
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-checkbox1: Mo ti lo paadi ifilọlẹ tẹlẹ lati ṣeto olufọwọsi Ethereum mi.
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-checkbox2: O ye mi pe mo nilo lati lo paadi ifilọlẹ lati dokowo. Awọn gbigbe to rọrun si adirẹsi yii kii yoo ṣiṣẹ.
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-checkbox3: Emi yoo ṣayẹwo adirẹsi adehun afipamo pẹlu awọn ohun elo miiran.
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-h2: Eyi kii ṣe ibiti o ti dokowo
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-meta-desc: Saridaju adirẹsi adehun afipamo fun idokowo Ethereum.
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-staking: Lati dokowo ETH rẹ o gbọdọ lo ọja launchpad ki o tẹle awọn ilana naa. Fifiranṣẹ ETH si adirẹsi ti o wa ni oju-iwe yii kii yoo jẹ ki o jẹ oludokowo ati pe yoo ja si idunadura to kuna.
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-staking-ch: A nireti pe ibẹ gbodo ni ọpọlọpọ awọn adirẹsi ayederu ati awọn jibiti. Lati wa ni ailewu, ṣayẹwo adiresi adehun idokowo ti o nlo si adirẹsi to wa ni oju-iwe yii. A gba o nimoran pe ki o ṣayẹwo rẹ pẹlu awọn orisun igbẹkẹle miiran paapaa.
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-subtitle: Eyi ni adirẹsi fun adehun idokowo Ethereum. Lo oju-iwe yii lati jẹrisi pe o nfi owo ranṣẹ si adirẹsi ti o tọ́ nigbati o ba dokowo.
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-warning: Ṣayẹwo ohun kikọ kọọkan ni pẹkipẹki.
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-warning-2: Fifi awọn owo ranṣẹ si adirẹsi yii ko ni ṣiṣẹ ati pe ko ni jẹ ki di oludokowo. O gbọdọ tẹle awọn itọsọna launchpad.

page-staking.comp-withdrawal-comparison-current-li-1: Àwọn olùmúlò kan lè ti fi àdírẹ́sì ìgba owó sílẹ̀ nígbà tí wọ́n kọ́kọ́ ṣètò àkọsílẹ̀ ìdókòwò — àwọn olùmúlò yìí kò ní ẹ̀tọ́ àwọn ohun míì tó yẹ kí wọ́n ṣe
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-comparison-current-li-2: Ọ̀pọ̀ nínú àwọn oludokòwò ko fi àdírẹ́sì ìgbowó silẹ̀ nígbàtí wọ́n fi owó sínú rẹ ní ìbẹ̀rẹ̀, wọ́n ní làti ṣe ìmúdójúìwọ̀n ìwé-ẹ̀rí ìgbowó wọn. Launchpad ídokòwò ní àwọn ìlànà lori bí o ṣe lè ṣe èyí
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-comparison-current-p: O lè fi nọ́mbà atọ́ka olùfọwọ́sí rẹ sí ibí láti mọ̀ bóyá o nílò láti ṣe ìmúdójúìwọ̀n àwọn ìwé ẹri rẹ<Text as="span" fontWeight="normal">(eléyìí wà nínú lọ́ọ́gì oníbàárà rẹ):</Text>
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-comparison-new-title: Àwọn olùdókòwò tuntun (tí won kò tíì ṣe ìfowópamọ́sí)
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-comparison-new-li-1: Ní àìyípadà, àwọn olùdókòwò tuntun tí wọn ń wá ọ̀nà láti máa gba èrè àti bí wọn yóò ti ṣe máa gba owó jáde ní láti fi àdírẹ́sì ìgbowó Ethereum kalẹ̀ tí wọ́n ní àkóso lórí tí wọ́n bá fẹ́ pilẹ̀ṣẹ̀ àwọn òrò àṣírí olùfọwọ́sí wọn pèlú lílo irinṣẹ́ ìfowópamọ́sí idokòwò CLI
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-comparison-new-li-2: Eléyìí kò pọn dandan ní àsìkò ìfowósílẹ̀, ṣùgbọ́n yóò dènà àti ṣe ìmúdójúìwọ̀n sí àwọn kọ́kọ́rọ́ wọ̀nyí tó bá yá láti ṣí owó rẹ
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-comparison-new-p: Páàdì ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ìdókòwò yóò ṣe atọ́nà láti bẹ̀rẹ̀ dídókòwò.
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-credentials-error: O tì o! Tún nọ́mbà atọ́ka olùyẹ̀wò wo ní ẹẹkan si kí o sì gbìyànjú lẹ́ẹ̀kan si.
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-credentials-upgraded-1: Atọ́ka olùyẹ̀wò {{validatorIndex}} ti ṣe tán láti bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ní gba èrè!
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-credentials-upgraded-2: Àkọsílẹ̀ ìgbà owó wà ní àsópọ̀ pẹ̀lú àdírẹ́sì ìṣiṣẹ́:
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-credentials-not-upgraded: Àwọn ìlànà lori ìgbésọ́kè wà lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ lórí Páàdì àfilọ́lẹ̀ ìdókòwò
page-staking.page-staking-image-alt: Àwòrán maskooti eranko ìmọ̀dò fún páádì ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ìdókòwò.
page-staking.page-staking-benefits-1-description: Èrè wà fún àwọn iṣẹ́ tó ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún nẹ́tìwọ́ọ̀kì láti dé ìfohùnṣọ̀kan. Ìwọ yóò gba ẹ̀rè fún mímú sọfitiwia ṣiṣẹ́ tó ń ṣètò àwọn ìdúnàádúrà sí àwọn búlọ́ọ́kù tuntun tí ó bá àwọn ìṣòwò pọ̀ sí àwọn bulọọki tuntun àti ṣayẹwo iṣẹ́ àwọn oluṣàyẹ̀wò mìíràn nítorí pé èyí ni ó ń jẹ́ kí ẹ̀dá náà le ṣiṣẹ́ ní ààbò.
page-staking.page-staking-benefits-2-description: Nẹtiwọọkí yóò ní agbára sí ìkọlù bíi ídokòwò ETH bá ṣe pọ̀ sí, ó sì nílò ETH pupọ sí làti ṣàkóso púpò nínú nẹ́tíwọọkì náà. Làti jẹ́ ìhàlẹ̀, ọ nílò láti ní àkóso ọ̀pọ̀ nínú àwọn olùfọwọ́sí, eyí túmọ̀ sí pé o nílò láti darí ọ̀pọ̀ ETH tó wà nínú ẹ̀rọ náà - ìyẹn pọ̀ gan-an!
page-staking.page-staking-benefits-3-description: Àwọn olùdókòwò kò nílò láti ṣe àwọn ìṣirò ẹ̀rí iṣẹ́-ṣíṣe alagbára púpọ̀ láti kópa nínú ìdáàbòbò nẹ́tíwọọkì náà èyí túmọ̀ sí pé àwọn nódù ìdókòwò lè ṣiṣẹ́ lórí ẹrọ oní ìwọ̀nba, nípasẹ̀ lílo agbára kékèké.
page-staking.page-staking-benefits-3-link: Àwọn àlàyé díẹ̀ síi nípa agbára lílò Ethereum
page-staking.page-staking-description: Dídókòwò jẹ́ iṣẹ́ tí ìwọ bá fi ETH méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n sílẹ̀ láti mú sofitiwiaolùṣàyẹ̀wò ṣiṣẹ́. Gẹ́gẹ́ bíi olùṣàyẹ̀wò, ìwọ yóò ní ojúṣe fún àfipamọ́ dátà, ṣíṣètò àwọn ìdúnàádúrà, àti fífi búlọ́ọ́kù tuntun sóri blockchain náà. Èyí yóò mú Ethereum wà ní ààbò fún gbogbo ènìyàn, ìwọ yóò jèrè ETH tuntun nínú ìlànà náà.
page-staking.page-staking-hero-title: Bí o ṣe lè fi ETH rẹ̀ dókòwò
page-staking.page-staking-hero-subtitle: Èyíkéyìí olùṣàmúlò pèlú iye ETH kankan lè ṣèrànwọ́ láti dáàbò bò nẹ́tíwọọkì náà, èrè sì wà nípasẹ̀ rẹ̀.
page-staking.page-staking-learn-more-solo: Kọ́ ẹ̀kọ́ síi nípa ìdókòwò aládaṣe
page-staking.page-staking-more-on-saas: Àlàyé síi nípa ìdókòwò gẹ́gẹ́ bíi iṣẹ́
page-staking.page-staking-learn-more-saas: Àlàyé síi nípa ìdókòwò gẹ́gẹ́ bíi iṣẹ́
page-staking.page-staking-learn-more-pools: Láti mọ̀ síi nípa ìdókòwò alápapọ̀
page-staking.page-staking-section-why-p1: Ó dá lórí iye owó tí o fẹ́ fí dókòwò. Wàá nílò ETH méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n láti mú olùṣàyẹ̀wò rẹ ṣiṣẹ́, ṣùgbọ́n ó ṣeé ṣe láti fi owó díẹ̀ dókòwò.
page-staking.page-staking-section-why-p2: Wo àwọn àṣàyàn tó wà ní isalẹ kí o sì yàn ẹ̀yà tó dára jùlọ fún ìwọ àti fún nẹ́tìwọ́ki náà.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-solo-pill-1: Tó ní ipa tó pọ̀ jùlọ
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-solo-p1: Home staking on Ethereum is the gold standard for staking. It provides full participation rewards, improves the decentralization of the network, and never requires trusting anyone else with your funds.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-solo-p2: Those considering staking from home should have some amount of ETH and a dedicated computer connected to the internet ~24/7. Some technical know-how is helpful, but easy-to-use tools now exist to help simplify this process.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-solo-p3: Home stakers can pool their funds with others, or go solo with at least 32 ETH. Liquid staking token solutions can be used to maintain access to DeFi.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-saas-pill-2: Àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ìgbaniwọlé àṣírí olùṣàyẹ̀wò rẹ
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-saas-p1: Tí o kò bá fẹ́ tàbí níní nǹkan ṣe pẹ̀lú kọ̀ǹpútà kò rọrùn fún ọ ṣùgbọ́n o ṣì fẹ́ láti ṣe ìdókòwò ETH méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n rẹ, àṣàyàn ìdókòwò-gẹ́gẹ́-bíi-ìṣẹ́ le jẹ́ kí o fi apá tó nira sílẹ̀ fún ẹlòmíràn, nígbà tí o bá ń ri tí ìwọ yóò sì máa jẹ èrè búlọ́ọ́kù abínibí.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-saas-p2: Àwọn àṣàyàn yìí máa ń kọ́ iwọ nípa bí a ṣe lè ṣẹ̀dá àwọn èlò olùyẹ̀wò, kí o ba lè fi àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ìgbaniwọlẹ́ rẹ̀ ránṣẹ́ sí wọn, àti kí o fi ETH méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n rẹ sílẹ̀. Èyí yòó jẹ́ kí alákóso iṣé ṣàyẹ̀wò dípò rẹ.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-saas-p3: Ìru ìlànà ídokòwò yìí nílò irú ìpele ìgbọ́kànlé kan nínú olùpèsè ìṣẹ́ náà. Láti dín ewu alákóso kù, àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ìgbaniwọlé láti fi yọ ETH rẹ wà ní ìṣàkóso rẹ.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-pools-p1: Several pooling solutions exist to assist users who do not have or feel comfortable staking 32 ETH.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-pools-p2: Ọ̀pọ̀ nínú àwọn àṣàyàn wọ̀nyí ni a mọ̀ sí ‘liquid staking’ tó ní ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú ERC-20 tọ́kẹ̀n alásọdowó tó jẹ́ aṣojú ETH tí o fi dókòwò.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-pools-p3: Liquid staking makes staking and unstaking as simple as a token swap and enables the use of staked capital in DeFi. This option also allows users to hold custody of their assets in their own Ethereum wallet.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-pools-p4: Ìdókòwò aládàpọ̀ kò jẹ́ ti abínibí nẹ́tíwọọkì Ethereum. Àwọn alákóso ẹnì kẹta ni ó dá àwọn ọ̀nà ojútùú wọ̀nyí, wọ́n sì fi orí ti àwọn ewu tó rọ̀ mọ.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-cex-pill-1: Tó ní ipa tó kéré jù lọ
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-cex-pill-2: Àwọn àbá ìgbẹ́kẹ̀lé tí ó ga jùlọ
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-cex-p1: Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ìṣàkóso pàṣípààrọ̀ ń pèsè iṣẹ́ ìdókòwò tí kò bá tíì rọ́run fún ọ pẹ̀lú fífi ETH sílẹ̀ nínú wọ́lẹ́ẹ́tì tìrẹ. Wọ́n lè jẹ́ aṣayan tó jẹ́ kí o lè rí èrè diẹ̀ lórí ìṣàkóso ETH rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú iṣẹ́ kékeré.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-cex-p2: Ìjuwọ́sílẹ̀ ibẹ̀ ni pé àwọn olùpèsè aláìlákóso ṣàkójọpọ̀ ETH ńlá láti mú àwọn oluṣàyẹ̀wò púpọ̀ ṣiṣẹ́. Èyí lè jẹ́ ewu fún nẹ́tíwọọkì náà àti àwọn olùsamulo rẹ̀ nítorí ó ṣe ìdásílẹ̀ ìdojúkọ alákóso ńlá àtí ọ̀nà ìkùnà, tí yóò mú kí olùpèsè náà súnmọ́ ìkọlù tàbí ìpalára.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-cex-p3: Tí kò bá tẹ́ ẹ lọ́run láti wà pẹ̀lúàwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ìgbaniwọlé rẹ, ó dára. Àwọn àṣàyàn yìí wà fún ọ. Ní àkókò yìí, ro láti wo ojú-ìwé wọ́lẹ́ẹ́tì wa, níbi tí o ti lè bẹ̀rẹ̀ ẹ̀kọ́ nípa bí o ṣe lè ní ìṣàkóso gidi lórí owó rẹ. Nígbà tí o bá ṣetán, padà wá kí o sì gbèrú eré ìdókòwò rẹ nípa fí fúnra gbígbìyànjú ara àwọn iṣẹ́ ìdókòwò alápapọ̀ tó wà ní ìpèsè.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-subtext: Bí o sì ti le ṣàkíyèsí, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ọ̀nà lo wà láti kópa nínú ìdokòwò Ethereum. Àwọn ọ̀nà wọ̀nyí ń fojúsun ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn olùṣàmúlò, àti pé ìkọ̀ọ̀kan wọn yàtọ̀ nípa àwọn ewu, èrè, àti àbá ìgbẹ́kẹ̀lé. Àwọn mìíràn jẹ́ aláìlákóso díẹ̀ síi, tí wọ́n yege àyẹ̀wò àti/ó sì lèwù diẹ̀ ju àwọn mìíràn lọ. A pèsè àwọn àlàyé nípa àwọn ìṣẹ́ àkànṣe tó gbajumọ̀ nínú àgbègbè yìí, ṣùgbọ́n ri dájú pé o ṣe ìwádìí tìrẹ ṣáájú kí o tó fi ETH sí ibikíbi.
page-staking.page-staking-comparison-solo-saas: Pẹlu àwọn olùpèsè SaaS, o ṣì nílò láti fi méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n ETH sílẹ̀, ṣùgbọ́n o kò nílò láti ṣiṣẹ́ ohun èlò. Nípa ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú wọn, o máa ní àṣẹ sí àwọn kọ́kọ́rọ́ olùyẹ̀wò rẹ, ṣùgbọ́n o tún nílò láti ṣàjọpín àwọn kọ́kọ́rọ́ wíwọlé rẹ kí oníṣẹ́ náà lè ṣiṣẹ́ dípò olùyẹ̀wò rẹ. Èyí ń ṣàfikún ipele ìgbọ́kànlé kan tí kò sí nípò nígbà tí o bá ń mú ohun èlò tirẹ̀ ṣiṣẹ́, èyí tí kò rí bẹ́ẹ̀ nínú ìdókòwò àdáṣe ní ilé. SaaS kò ṣèrànwọ́ tó pẹ̀lú pínpín nódù káàkiri àwọn àgbègbè. Bí o kò bá fẹ́ràn láti mú ohun ẹ̀rọ ṣiṣẹ́ ṣùgbọ́n o ṣì ń wá láti fi ETH méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n sílẹ̀, lílo olùpèsè SaaS lè jẹ́ àṣàyàn tó dára fún ọ.
page-staking.page-staking-comparison-solo-pools: Ìdókòwò àdáṣe ní ìlọ́wọ́sí tó ga ju ìdókòwò pẹ̀lú iṣẹ́ àkójọpọ̀ kan, ṣùgbọ́n ó ń fún ni ní àṣẹ pátápátá sí àwọn èrè ETH, àti àṣẹ pátápátá lórí ìṣètò àti ààbò olùyẹ̀wò rẹ. Ìdókòwò àkójọpọ̀ ní ìsọ́kànsí tó kéré jùlọ fún ìbáṣepọ̀. Àwọn olùṣàmúlò lè fi iye kékèké ETH dókòwò, wọn kò nílò láti ṣẹ̀dá àwọn kọ́kọ́rọ́ olùyẹ̀wò, àti wọn kò nílò àwọn ìbéèrè fún ohun ẹ̀rọ ju àsopọ̀ mọ́ íńtánẹ́ẹ̀tì. Àwọn tókẹ̀n ìsọdowó ń jẹ́ kí o lè yọkúrò nínú ìdókòwò kí èyí tó ṣiṣẹ́ ní ipele ìlànà. Tí o bá nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí àwọn àbùdá wọ̀nyí, ìdókòwò àkójọpọ̀ lè jẹ́ aṣayan tó dára fún ọ.
page-staking.page-staking-comparison-saas-solo: Àwọn ohun tó jọra níbẹ̀ ni àwọn kọ́kọ́rọ́ olùyẹ̀wò tìrẹ láì nílò láti ṣíṣakójọ owó, ṣùgbọ́n pẹ̀lú SaaS, o ní láti gbẹ́kẹ̀lé ẹnì kẹta, tó lè hùwà ọ̀daràn tàbí di ẹni àkọlù tàbí tí òfin kálọwọ́kò. Tí àwọn àbá ìgbẹ́kẹ̀lé wọ̀nyí tàbí àwọn ewu alákóso bá ń jẹ́ àníyàn fún ọ, ìdiwọ̀n góólù ti ìdókòwò tó ní àkóso ara ẹni ni ìdókòwò aládaṣe.
page-staking.page-staking-comparison-saas-pools: Àwọn yìí ní àfínkúpọ̀ nítorí pé o sábà ń gbẹ́kẹ̀ lé ẹlòmíràn láti ṣiṣẹ́ olùyẹ̀wò, ṣùgbọ́n, kì í ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀ pẹ̀lú SaaS, ìdókòwò àkójọpọ̀ ń jẹ́ kí o lè kópa pẹ̀lú iye kékèké ETH. Tí o bá ń wá láti dókòwò pẹ̀lú iye tó kéré sí ETH méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n, rò láti ṣàyẹ̀wò àwọn wọ̀nyí.
page-staking.page-staking-comparison-pools-solo: Pooled staking has a significantly lower barrier to entry when compared to home staking, but comes with additional risk by delegating all node operations to a third-party, and with a fee. Home staking gives full sovereignty and control over the choices that go into choosing a staking setup. Stakers never have to hand over their keys, and they earn full rewards without any middlemen taking a cut.
page-staking.page-staking-comparison-pools-saas: Àwọn yìí ní àfínkúpọ̀ nítorí pé àwọn olùdókòwò kò mú sọfitiwia olùsàyẹ̀wò ṣiṣẹ́ fúnra wọn, ṣùgbọ́n kìí ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn aṣàyàn àkójọpọ̀, SaaS nílò fífi méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n ETH pátápátá sílẹ̀ láti mú olùsàyẹ̀wò kan ṣiṣẹ́. Èrè ń kó pọ̀ fún olùdókòwò, àti pé ó sábà máa ń ní owó sísan ti oṣooṣù tàbí ìdókòwò mìíràn láti lò iṣẹ́ náà. Tí o bá fẹ́ àwọn kọ́kọ́rọ́ olùsàyẹ̀wò tìrẹ àti pé o ń wá láti fi o kere ju méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n ETH dókòwò, lílo olùpèsè SaaS lè jẹ́ àṣàyàn tó dára fún ọ.
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-solo-1-descr: Kóòdù pàtàkì jẹ́ àrọ́wọ́ọ́tó ní ìdá ọgọ́rùn-ún ó sì wà fún gbogbo ènìyàn láti ṣe àtúnṣe àti lò
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-solo-2-descr: Wọ́n ti ṣe ojúlówó àyẹ̀wò kóòdù pàtàkì pẹ̀lú àwọn àbájáde tó ti jẹ́ àtẹ̀jáde tó sì wà fún gbogbo ènìyàn
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-solo-3-descr: A ti ṣe ètò èrè fún wíwá àṣìṣe ẹ̀rọ kan fún gbogbo ènìyàn lórí kọ́ọ̀dù pàtàkì láti san èrè fún àwọn olùṣàmúlò fún ìjábọ̀ ní àíséwu àti/tàbí àtúnṣe àwọn àṣìṣe
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-solo-4-descr: Sọfitiwia ti wà fún ìlò gbogbo ènìyàn fún ìgbà tí a tọ́ka sí
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-solo-4-valid: Láàyè ní àkókò tó pé ju ọdún kan lọ
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-solo-4-cauti: Láàyè ní àkókò tó pé ju oṣù mẹ́fà lọ
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-solo-5-descr: Àwọn kọ́kọ́rọ́ olùṣàyẹ̀wọ̀ ní a kò fí sí ọwọ́ èyíkéyìí ènìyàn míìràn nígbàkigbà nínú ìgbésí ayé olùṣàyẹ̀wò. Èyíkéyìí àwọn àdéhùn ọlọ́gbọ́n tó kàn tó bá wà nínú rẹ̀ kò ní àwọn ẹnubodè ẹ̀yìn, láì gbára lé àwọn àṣẹ àkànṣe fún ìmúṣẹ.
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-solo-6-descr: Àwọn olùmúlò kò nílò èyíkéyìí ìgbanilááyè pàtàkì láti ṣiṣẹ́ olùfọwọ́sí nípa lílo sọfitiwia tàbí iṣẹ́ náà
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-solo-7-descr: Sọfitiwia jẹ́ kí àwọn olùmúlò yàn láti àti ṣe àyípadà láàrín ó kéré jù méjì tàbí díẹ̀ síi àwọn oníbàárà amúṣẹ́ṣe, àti méjì tàbí díẹ̀ síi àwọn oníbàárà ipele ìfohùnṣọ̀kan
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-solo-7-warni: Ti mọ níwọ̀n ba sí oníbàárà tó pọ̀jù
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-solo-8-descr: Àwọn ẹ̀rí olùyẹ̀wò yòó wà ni àkàtà olùmúlò, to fi mọ́ bíbuwọ́lu àti yíyọ kúrò àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ìgbaniwọlé àṣírí
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-solo-9-descr: Àwọn olùmúlò lè lo olùyẹ̀wò pèlú dí dókòwò ó pọ̀jù ETH méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n, ṣíṣe àmúlò àdàpọ̀ owó àwọn olùmúlò yòókù
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-saas-4-descr: Iṣẹ́ ti wà àti ti jẹ́ kí gbogbo ènìyàn lò fún àsìkò tó tọ́ka sí
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-saas-6-descr: Àwọn olùmúlò kò nílò àkànṣe àṣẹ, ní àkántì tàbí mímọ oníbàárà láti kópa pẹ̀lú iṣẹ́ nàá
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-saas-7-descr: Ojú òpó kò gbọ́dọ̀ ṣe ju ìdá àbọ̀ nínú ọgọ́rùn-ún gbogbo àwọn olùṣàyẹ̀wò tí wọ́n ní ọ̀pọ̀ oníbàárà tó ń ṣiṣẹ́

page-staking.page-staking-considerations-pools-6-desc: Oju opo le jekí enikeni darapọ gẹgẹ bí oluṣe ǹoódu fún okowo aladapọ nàá, lai gba iyọnda
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-pools-7-desc: Ojú òpó kò gbọ́dọ̀ ṣe ju ìdá àbọ̀ nínú ọgọ́rùn-ún gbogbo àwọn olùṣàyẹ̀wò tí wọ́n ní ọ̀pọ̀ oníbàárà tó ń ṣiṣẹ́
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-pools-8-desc: Pèsè tọ́kẹ̀n alásodowó tí yòó dúró fún ETH tí o fi dókòwò, èyí tó wà nínú wọ́lẹ́ẹ́tí rẹ
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-pools-9-desc: Ojú òpó kò gbọ́dọ̀ ṣe ju ìdá àbọ̀ nínú ọgọ́rùn-ún gbogbo àwọn olùṣàyẹ̀wò tí wọ́n ní ọ̀pọ̀ oníbàárà tó ń ṣiṣẹ́
page-staking.page-staking-how-solo-works-item-1: O ní láti ní kọ̀ǹpútà afojúrí: o ní láti mú ǹoódu ṣiṣẹ́ láti dókòwò
page-staking.page-staking-how-solo-works-item-4: Pilẹ̀ṣẹ̀ àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ìgbaniwọlé kí o sì fi sí orí oníbàárà olùṣàyẹ̀wò rẹ
page-staking.page-staking-how-solo-works-item-5: Ṣàbójútó kí o sì ṣetọ́jú nòódu rẹ
page-staking.page-staking-launchpad-widget-p1: Olùyẹ̀wò aládaṣe gbọdọ̀ ṣe àyẹ̀wò ètò-iṣẹ́ wọn àti ìṣiṣẹ́ si lórí Holesky testnet ṣáájú fífowó si. Rántí pé dandan ni láti mú oníbàárà kékeré nítorí yòó ṣe ààbò nẹ́tíwọọkì tó dájú àti dín ewu rẹ kù.
page-staking.page-staking-launchpad-widget-p2: Tí o ba ní ìfọkàbalẹ lori rẹ, o le ṣe gbogbo ńkan ti o nílo sì ori ila kọmandi pèlú Staking Lauchpad ni kan.
page-staking.page-staking-launchpad-widget-p3: Láti mú já geere, ṣàyẹ̀wò àwọn irinṣẹ́ àti ìtọ́sọ́nà tí yóò ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún ẹ pèlú Staking Launchpad làti ṣàgbékalẹ̀ àwọn oníbàárà rẹ ní ìrọ̀rùn.
page-staking.page-staking-stats-box-metric-1: Àpapọ̀ ETH tí a ti fi dókòwò
page-staking.page-staking-stats-box-metric-1-tooltip: Àpapọ̀ ETH tí a fi dókòwò lórí Beacon Chain, láì kan àwọn owó tó kù lórí ETH méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n
page-staking.page-staking-stats-box-metric-2-tooltip: Àpapọ̀ àwọn àkántì olùṣàyẹ̀wò tó ń ṣiṣẹ́ lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ lórí Beacon Chain
page-staking.page-staking-stats-box-metric-3-tooltip: Ìwòn àárín èrè ètò ìsúná ọlọ́dọọdún ọ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan àwọn olùṣàyẹ̀wò ní bíi wákàtí mẹ́rìnlélógún
page-staking.page-staking-section-comparison-subtitle: Kò sí ojútù kan pato fún gbogbo ènìyàn nínú idokowò, àti pe ojútù kòókan yatò́. Níhìn, a máa ṣe afiwe àwọn ewu, èrè, àti àwọn ńkan ti a nilo tó wà nínú àwọn ọ̀nà oríṣiríṣi tí o lè fi dokowò.
page-staking.page-staking-section-comparison-solo-rew: Iye èrè tó ga jù - gba gbogbo èrè tààrà láti orí ìlànà náà
Rewards for proposing blocks, including unburnt transaction fees, and attesting regularly to the state of the network
Option to mint a liquid staking token against your home node to be used in DeFi
page-staking.page-staking-section-comparison-saas-rew: Nígbà gbogbo ó pẹ̀lú àwọn èrè ìlànà ní kíkún pẹ̀lú ìyọkùrò owó oṣooṣù fún àwọn iṣẹ́ nódù
Àwọn dáṣíbọ́ọ̀dù sábà máa ń wà láti jẹ́ kí ó rọrùn láti tọpasẹ̀ oníbàárà olùṣàyẹ̀wò rẹ
page-staking.page-staking-section-comparison-pools-re: Àwọn onídókòwò àpapọ̀ máa ń gba èrè ní ọ̀nà tó yàtọ̀, ó dá lórí irú ọ̀nà ìdókòwò àpapọ̀ tí wọ́n yàn
Ọ̀pọ̀ iṣẹ́ ídòkowò alápapọ̀ máa ń pèsè ọ̀kan tàbí díẹ̀ síitọ́kẹ̀n ìsọdowó èyí tó sójú ETH tí o fi dókòwò pẹ̀lú ìpín rẹ̀ nínú èrè àwọn olùṣàyẹ̀wò
Àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n ìsọdowó lè wà nínú wọ́lẹ́ẹ́tì rẹ, tàbí kí o lò wọn ní DeFi o sì lè tà wọ́n tí o bá pinnu láti jáde kúrò
page-staking.page-staking-section-comparison-solo-ris: Àwọn ìbáwí wà, tó jẹ́ pẹ̀lú ETH, fún kí kúrò lórí ayélujára
Slashing (larger penalties and ejection from the network) for malicious behaviour
Minting a liquid staking token will introduce smart contract risk, but this is entirely optional
page-staking.page-staking-section-comparison-saas-ris: Ewu kan náà bíi ìdókòwò aládaṣe pèlú àfikún ewu ìdojúkọ ẹgbẹ́ ti olùpèsè iṣẹ́
Lílo àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ìgbaniwolẹ́ rẹ ni o fi sí ọwọ́ ẹlòmíràn tó lè hùwà àìṣedéédéé
page-staking.page-staking-section-comparison-pools-ri: Àwọn ewu dá lórí irú ìlanà tí a lò
Ní àkótán, àwọn ewu jẹ́ àpapọ̀ ìdojúkọ ẹgbẹ́àdéhùn ọlọ́gbọ́n àti ewu ìmúlò
page-staking.page-staking-section-comparison-solo-req: O gbọdọ̀ fi ETH méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n sínú àkántì
Ṣètọ́jú ẹ̀rọ kọ̀ǹpútà aláfojúrí tó ń ṣiṣẹ́ pọ̀ pẹ̀lú Ethereum oníbàárà iṣẹ́ ati oníbàárà ìfohùnṣọ̀kan nígbà tó sopọ̀ pẹ̀lú àyelujara
Àwọn Staking Launchpad yóò kọ́ ọ nípasẹ̀ ìlànà àti àwọn ìbéèrè irú ohun ẹ̀rọ kọ̀ǹpútà tí o lè lò
page-staking.page-staking-section-comparison-saas-req: Fi ETH méjìlélógbọ̀n sílẹ̀ wàà sí ṣẹ̀dá àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ìgbaniwọlé àṣírí rẹ pẹ̀lú ìrànlọ́wọ́
Tọ́jú àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ìgabaniwolé àṣírí dáadáa
Àwọn tó kù ni a ti bójútó, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn iṣẹ́ pàtàkì yóò yàtọ̀ sí ara wọn
page-staking.page-staking-section-comparison-pools-re: Awọn ìbéèrè ETH tó kéré jù lọ, àwọn iṣẹ́ kan nílò bíi 0.01ETH
Fi owó ní tààrà láti inú wọ́lẹ́ẹ́tí rẹ sínú àwọn oríṣiríṣi pẹpẹ ídókòwò alápapọ̀ tàbí ra ọ̀kan nínú àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n ìsọdowó ti dídókòwò
page-staking.page-staking-faq-1-answer: Oluṣayẹwo jẹ́ ńkan alaifojurí tí o ń ṣisẹ loti Ẹ̀tẹ́ríọ́mù bakanaa o tun kopa ninu ìfohùnṣọ̀kan ilana Ẹ̀tẹ́ríọ́mù. Oluṣayẹwo ní aṣoju bí owó, òrò igbaniwọlẹ, ati àwọn èlo míìran. Oluṣayẹwo onibáàra jẹ afilọlẹ tì ó ṣiṣẹ gẹgẹ bí oluṣayẹwo pèlú fifi pamọ ati lilo òrò igbaniwọlẹ rẹ. Oluṣayẹwo onibáàra kan ní ikapa lati fí ọpọlọpọ òrò igbaniwọlẹ, ẹyi tí o ń ṣakoso ọpọ oluṣayẹwo.
page-staking.page-staking-faq-2-question: Ìdí tí mo ni lati nì owó ní ìdókòwo?
page-staking.page-staking-faq-2-answer: Olùṣàyẹ̀wò ní agbára láti gbèrò àti jẹ́rìí sí búlọ́ọ́kù fún nẹ́tíwọọkì náà. Láti dènà ìwà àìṣòdodo, àṣàmúlo gbọ́dọ̀ ní owó ní ìdókòwò. Èyí yóò jẹ́ kí ìlànà fi ìyà jẹ aláìṣedéédé. Dídókòwò jẹ́ ọ̀nà láti jẹ́ olóòtọ, nítorí pé iṣẹ́ rẹ yóò ní àbájáde.
page-staking.page-staking-faq-3-answer-p1: Kò sí tọ́kẹ̀n 'ETH2' tó jẹ́ abínibí sí ìlànà náà, tọ́kẹ̀n abínibí ether(ETH) kò yí padà nígbàtí Ethereum yí padà sí ìjẹ́rìí sí ìdókòwò.
page-staking.page-staking-faq-3-answer-p2: Àwọn tọ́kẹ̀n/tíkásì ìtọ̀sẹ̀ tó lè sójú ETH tí a fi dókòwò(ie. rETH láti Rocket Pool, stETH láti Lido, ETH2 láti Coinbase). kọ́ síi nípa ìdókòwò alápapọ̀
page-staking.page-staking-faq-4-question: Ǹjẹ́ ìdókòwò ti wà láàyè lórí ayélujára?
page-staking.page-staking-faq-4-answer-p1: Bẹ́ẹ̀nì. Ìdókòwò ti wà láàyè láti oṣù kejìlá, odún 2020
page-staking.page-staking-faq-4-answer-p2: Èyí túnmọ̀ sí pé ìdókòwò wà lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ fún àwọn aṣàmúlò láti fi ETH wọn pamọ́, mú oníbàárà olùṣàyẹ̀wò ṣiṣẹ́, àti bèrè sí ní jẹ èrè.
page-staking.page-staking-faq-4-answer-p3: Ìgbésókè Shanghai/Capella parí ní ọjọ́ kejìlá oṣù kẹrin, ọdún 2023, tó gbaniláàyè làti yọ ìdókòwò kúrò, láti parí ìlànà ídokòwò alásọdowó.
page-staking.page-staking-faq-5-question: Ìgbà wo ni mo lè yọ ETH ídokòwò mí kúrò?
page-staking.page-staking-faq-5-answer-p1: Ní báyìí! Àwọn olùdókòwò lè yọ èrè tàbí ojú-owó kúrò látinú ìyókù olùṣàyẹ̀wò tí wọ́n bá fẹ́.
page-staking.page-staking-faq-5-answer-p2: Àwọn olùdókòwò tún lè jẹ èrè gẹ́gẹ́ bíi owó sísan tàbí MEV nìgbatí wọ́n bá ń gbèrò àwọn búlọ́ọ́kù, èyí tí a ti pèsè lẹ́sẹ̀kẹ́sẹ̀ nípasẹ̀ owó sísan àdírẹ́sì olùgbà.
page-staking.page-staking-faq-5-answer-link: Díẹ̀ si lori yiyọ kuro idokowò
page-staking.page-staking-further-reading-5-link: Ti parí no. 33, ipele ìfohùnṣọ̀kan Ethereum (Oṣù kínní 2022)
page-staking.page-staking-further-reading-8-link: Àwọn Ohun èlò Ẹ̀kọ́ Beaconcha.in Tí Àwùjọ Lọ́wọ́sí
page-staking.page-staking-further-reading-9-link: Àwọn Ìbéèrè Gbogbo ìgbà Ethereum Staking Launchpad
page-staking.page-staking-toc-how-to-stake-your-eth: Bí o ṣe lè fi ETH rẹ̀ dókòwò
page-staking.page-staking-join-community-desc: Àwọn olùdókòwò Eth jẹ́ àwùjọ fún gbogbo ènìyàn làti jíròrò àti kọ́ nípa dídókòwò lórí Ethereum. Darapọ̀ mọ́ ogunlọ́gọ̀ àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ káàkiri àgbáyé fún ìmọ̀ràn, àtìlẹyìn, àti láti sọ gbogbo nǹkan nípa dídókòwò.
page-staking.page-staking-meta-description: Àkópọ̀ nípa dídókòwò pèlú Ethereum: àwọn ewu, èrè, nǹkan tó nílò àti ibi tí a ó ti ṣé.
page-staking.page-staking-withdrawals-important-notic: Kò sí ìpèsè fún àyọkúrò báyìí. Jọ̀wọ́ ka àwọn ìbéèrè tó wọ́pọ̀ ti ìdàpọ̀ àti lẹ́yìn ìdàpọ̀ Eth2 fún àlàyé síi.
page-staking.page-upgrades-merge-btn: Ní àfi kún sí The Merge
page-staking.subscribe-to-ef-blog: Darapọ̀ mọ́ búlọ́ọ́gì EF láti gba ímeèlì ìfitónilétí fún àwọn ìkéde ìlànà tuntun.

page-translatathon.translatathon-apply-now-desc: Apply now to participate in the Translatathon

page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-bug-hunting-d: Find and report bugs in consensus layer upgrade specifications or the clients themselves. You can earn up to $50,000 USD and earn a place on the leaderboard.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-desc-1: Running a client means you'll be an active participant in Ethereum. Your client will help keep track of transactions and check new blocks.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-desc-2: If you have ETH, you can stake it to become a validator and help secure the network. As a validator you can earn ETH rewards.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-desc-3: Join the community testing effort! Help test Ethereum upgrades before they're shipped, find bugs, and earn rewards.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-how: How do you want to get involved?
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-how-desc: The Ethereum community will always benefit from more folks running clients, staking, and bug hunting.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-join-desc: Like most things with Ethereum, a lot of the research is public. This means you can take part in the discussions or just read through what the Ethereum researchers have to say. ethresear.ch covers a number of topics including consensus upgrades, rollups and more.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-meta-descript: How to participate in Ethereum upgrades: run nodes, stake, hunt bugs and more.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-run-clients-d: A 'client' is software that runs the blockchain, and in the case of Ethereum, a full node requires running a pair of these clients: an execution layer client and a consensus layer client. A full node can check transactions and, if also staking ETH, can create new blocks. Each client has its own features but performs the same function overall, so we encourage you to choose a minority client whenever possible to keep the client pool diverse and secure.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-run-clients-e: These clients were formerly referred to as 'Eth1' clients, but this term is being deprecated in favor of 'execution layer' clients.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-run-clients-c: These clients were formerly referred to as 'Eth2' clients, but this term is being deprecated in favor of 'consensus layer' clients.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-stake-desc: You can now stake your ETH to help secure the beacon chain.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-subtitle: Here's all the ways you can help with Ethereum and future upgrade-related efforts.

page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-answer-1: The Beacon Chain was used as a tool to upgrade Ethereum Mainnet at The Merge.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-answer-2: With The Merge, Ethereum had its most substantial upgrade ever swapping proof-of-work for a new proof-of-stake based consensus layer.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-answer-4: The Beacon Chain was used to develop the proof-of-stake-based consensus Ethereum uses today. It was run separately to Ethereum Mainnet so developers could observe the consensus mechanism in isolation before using it to coordinate real activity.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrade-article-author-eip-4844: Vitalik Buterin, Dankrad Feist, Diederik Loerakker, George Kadianakis, Matt Garnett, Mofi Taiwo
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrade-article-title-two-point-oh: Two Point Oh: The Beacon Chain
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrade-article-title-beacon-chain-: The Beacon Chain Ethereum 2.0 explainer you need to read first
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrade-article-title-sharding-is-g: Why sharding is great: demystifying the technical properties
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrade-article-title-sharding-das: An explanation of sharding and data availability sampling (DAS)
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrade-article-title-state-of-the-: The State of The Merge: An Update on Ethereum’s Merge to Proof of Stake in 2022
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-beacon-chain-date: The Beacon Chain went live on December 1, 2020
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-beacon-chain-desc: The Beacon Chain brought staking to Ethereum and laid the groundwork for future upgrades. It coordinates the new proof-of-stake Ethereum.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-clients: Check out the consensus clients (previously known as 'Eth2' clients)
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-dive-desc: How are we making Ethereum more scalable, secure, and sustainable? All while keeping Ethereum's core ethos of decentralization.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-merge-answer-1: The Merge was when Ethereum transitioned to proof-of-stake consensus on September 15, 2022. The Beacon Chain merged with Mainnet, officially deprecating proof-of-work on Ethereum, and reduced Ethereum’s energy consumption by ~99.95%.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-merge-desc: Mainnet Ethereum merged with the proof-of-stake Beacon Chain, marking the end of energy-intensive mining.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-help: Want to help with the Ethereum upgrades?
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-help-desc: There are plenty of opportunities to weigh in on the Ethereum upgrades, help with testing, and even earn rewards.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-index-staking-desc: Key to the Ethereum upgrades is the introduction of staking. If you want to use your ETH to help secure the Ethereum network, make sure you follow these steps.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-index-staking-learn-desc: The Beacon Chain brought staking to Ethereum. If you have ETH, you can do a public good by securing the network and earn more ETH in the process.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-index-staking-step-1-desc: To stake on Ethereum you'll need to use the launchpad - this will walk you through the process.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-index-staking-step-2-desc: Before you stake your ETH, be sure to check you've got the right address. You must have gone through the launchpad before doing this.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-meta-desc: An overview of the Ethereum upgrades and the vision they hope to make a reality.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-1-desc: Ethereum is being upgraded progressively; the upgrades are distinct with different ship dates.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-2-title: Is the Beacon Chain a separate blockchain?
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-2-desc: Yes. The Beacon Chain was the name given to a parallel proof-of-stake blockchain used to upgrade Ethereum's Mainnet. There is now only one blockchain, formed by merging the original Ethereum blockchain and the Beacon Chain together.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-3-answer-2a: The Merge had minimal impact on dapp developers - they still interact with Ethereum in the same ways.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-3-answer-2b: Sharding plans are still being developed, but will be designed with layer 2 rollups in mind.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-3-desc: You don't have to do anything right now to prepare for the upgrades.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-3-title: How do I prepare for the upgrades?
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-4-answer-1: Whenever you send a transaction or use a dapp today, you're using the execution layer, also known as Mainnet.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-4-answer-3: Since The Merge, validators secure the entire network via proof-of-stake.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-4-answer-6: Anyone can become a validator by staking their ETH.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-4-desc: Before The Merge, the Ethereum blockchain was sometimes referred to as 'Eth1.' This term was phased out in favor of the 'execution layer'.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-5-answer-1: To become a validator on the network, you'll need to stake 32 ETH. If you don't have that much, or aren't willing to stake that much, you can join staking pools. These pools will let you stake less and earn fractions of the total rewards.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-5-desc: You'll need to use the staking launchpad or join a staking pool.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-6-answer-3: Danny Ryan of the Ethereum foundation regularly updates the community:
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-6-answer-4: Ben Edgington of ConsenSys has a weekly newsletter about the Ethereum upgrades:
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-6-answer-5: You can also join the discussion on Ethereum research and development at ethresear.ch.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-6-title: What do I need to do with my dapp?
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-6-desc: The Merge was designed to have minimal impact on dapp developers, though there were a couple of small changes worth noting.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-6-answer-1: Dapp developers familiar with pre-merge Ethereum should be aware of some changes. These changes include block structure and timing, a few opcode changes, sources of onchain randomness and the concept of epoch finalization.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-6-answer-1-link: How The Merge Impacted Ethereum's Application Layer
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-7-desc: Many different teams from all over the community are working on the various Ethereum upgrades.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-8-answer-1: The Ethereum upgrades will help Ethereum scale in a decentralized way, while maintaining security, and increasing sustainability.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-8-answer-2: Perhaps the most obvious problem is that Ethereum needs to be able to handle more than 15-45 transactions per second. But the upgrades also address some other problems with Ethereum today.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-8-answer-3: The network at times of high demand leaves Ethereum expensive to use. Nodes in the network are struggling under the size of Ethereum and the amount of data their computers are having to process. The original algorithm that underlaid Ethereum security and decentralization was energy intensive and needed to be greener.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-8-answer-4: A lot of what's changing has always been on the Ethereum roadmap, even since 2015. But current conditions are making the need for the upgrades even greater.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-8-desc: The Ethereum we use today needs to offer a better experience to end users and network participants.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-9-answer-1: The most active role you can play is to stake your ETH.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-9-answer-2: You may also want to run a second client to help improve client diversity.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-9-answer-3: If you're more technical, you can help catch bugs in the new clients.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-9-answer-4: You can also weigh in on the technical discussions with Ethereum researchers at ethresear.ch.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-9-desc: You don't have to be technical to contribute. The community is looking for contributions from all kinds of skill sets.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-9-title: How can I contribute to Ethereum upgrades?
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-9-more: Find more general ways to get involved with Ethereum
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-10-answer-0: The term 'Eth2' itself is being phased out, as it does not represent a single upgrade or new network. It is more accurately a set of multiple upgrades that all do their part to make Ethereum more scalable, secure, and sustainable. The network you know and love will simply be referred to as Ethereum.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-10-answer-1: We're reluctant to talk too much in terms of a technical roadmap because this is software: things can change. We think it's easier to understand what's happening when you read about the outcomes.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-10-answer-2: But if you've followed the discussions, here's how the upgrades fit into technical roadmaps, and a bit on how they're changing.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-10-answer-3: Phase 0 described the work to get the Beacon Chain live.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-10-answer-5: Phase 1 originally focused on implementing the shard chains, but prioritization shifted to The Merge, which shipped on September 15, 2022.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-10-answer-6: Phase 1.5 was originally planned to follow shard implementations when Mainnet would be added as the last shard to the Beacon Chain. However, as rollup technology progressed, the Ethereum community expedited the transition away from proof-of-work instead.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-10-answer-7: The plans around Phase 2 have been a point of intense research and discussion. With The Merge behind us, and the advancements in layer 2 solutions, goals have shifted to provide a more simplified form of data sharding to maximize rollup efficiency. Current layer 2s enable the ability to scale transaction execution, and sharding will allow for storage of proofs for this data on layer 1 in a cheap and scalable manner.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-11-desc: No. There is no Eth2 token, and your ETH did not change after The Merge.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-11-answer-1: One of the driving forces behind the Eth2 rebrand was the common misconception that ETH holders were required to migrate their ETH to 'ETH 2.0' after The Merge or any other upgrade. This is not true and never has been.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-11-answer-2: This confusion is commonly exploited by scammers.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question3-answer-1: ETH holders don't need to do anything. Your ETH will not need changing or upgrading. There's almost certain to be scams telling you otherwise, so be careful.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-scalable-desc: Ethereum needs to support 1000s of transactions per second, to make applications faster and cheaper to use.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-secure-desc: Ethereum needs to be more secure. As the adoption of Ethereum grows, the protocol needs to become more secure against all forms of attack.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-shard-date: Sharding will follow The Merge in multiple phases, sometime in 2023-2024.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-shard-desc: Danksharding will expand Ethereum's capacity to store data, and work harmoniously with L2s to scale throughput and reduce network fees. Danksharding will be rolled out in multiple stages, starting with ProtoDanksharding.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-stay-up-to-date-desc: Get the latest from the researchers and developers working on the Ethereum upgrades.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-sustainable-desc: Ethereum was energy-intense until recently. The transition to proof-of-stake brought a network energy reduction of over 99.9%.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-take-part-desc: Ethereum researchers and enthusiasts alike meet here to discuss research efforts, including everything related to Ethereum upgrades.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-the-upgrades-desc: Ethereum upgrades aim to improve the network's scalability, security, and sustainability. Ethereum has recently undergone some major upgrades to security and sustainability, and there are more coming in the future, especially relating to scalability.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-unofficial-roadmap: This is not the official roadmap. This is how we view what's happening based on the information out there. But this is technology, things can change in an instant. So please don't read this as a commitment.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-upgrade-desc: The Ethereum we know and love, just more scalable, more secure, and more sustainable...
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-upgrading: Upgrading Ethereum to radical new heights
page-upgrades-index.page-roadmap-vision-desc: To bring Ethereum into the mainstream and serve all of humanity, we have to make Ethereum more scalable, secure, and sustainable.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-happened-to-eth2-1: The term 'Eth2' was commonly used before The Merge but is being phased out in favor of more precise terminology.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-happened-to-eth2-2: Since merging 'Eth1' and 'Eth2', there are no longer two distinct Ethereum blockchains; there is only Ethereum.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-happened-to-eth2-3: To limit confusion, the community has updated these terms:
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-happened-to-eth2-3-1: 'Eth1' is now the 'execution layer', which handles transactions and execution.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-happened-to-eth2-3-2: 'Eth2' is now the 'consensus layer', which handles proof-of-stake consensus.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-happened-to-eth2-4: These terminology updates only change naming conventions; this does not alter Ethereum's goals or roadmap.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-why-cant-we-just-use-eth2-: Why can't we just use Eth2?

One major problem with the Eth2 branding is that it creates a broken mental model for new users of Ethereum. They intuitively think that Eth1 comes first and Eth2 comes after. Or that Eth1 ceases to exist once Eth2 exists. Neither of these is true. By removing Eth2 terminology, we save all future users from navigating this confusing mental model.

As the roadmap for Ethereum has evolved, Ethereum 2.0 has become an inaccurate representation of Ethereum’s roadmap. Being careful and accurate in our word choice allows content on Ethereum to be understood by the broadest audience possible.

Unfortunately, malicious actors have attempted to use the Eth2 misnomer to scam users by telling them to swap their ETH for ‘ETH2’ tokens or that they must somehow migrate their ETH before the Eth2 upgrade. We hope this updated terminology will bring clarity to eliminate this scam vector and help make the ecosystem safer.

Some staking operators have also represented ETH staked on the Beacon Chain with the ‘ETH2’ ticker. This creates potential confusion, given that users of these services are not actually receiving an ‘ETH2’ token. No ‘ETH2’ token exists; it simply represents their share in that specific providers’ stake.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-to-do: What do you need to do?
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-to-do-desc: If you're a dapp user or ETH holder, you don't need to do anything. If you're a developer or want to start staking, there are ways you can get involved today.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-whats-next-desc: The Ethereum roadmap involves interconnected protocol upgrades that will make the network more scalable, more secure, and more sustainable. These upgrades are being built by multiple teams from across the Ethereum ecosystem.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-security-link: More on security and scam prevention

page-upgrades.page-upgrades-merge-infographic-el: Ethereum State: transactions, apps, contracts, balances
page-upgrades.page-upgrades-merge-infographic-alt-text: Infographic illustrating how the Beacon Chain merges into Ethereum's execution layer during the transition from proof-of-work to proof-of-stake.
page-upgrades.page-upgrades-post-merge-banner-tutorial: This tutorial is out of date after the merge and may not work. Please raise a PR if you would like to contribute.
page-upgrades.consensus-beaconscan-desc: Beacon Chain explorer - Etherscan for the consensus layer
page-upgrades.consensus-become-staker-desc: Staking is live! If you want to stake your ETH to help secure the network, make sure you’re aware of the risks.
page-upgrades.consensus-run-beacon-chain-desc: Ethereum needs as many clients running as possible. Help with this Ethereum public good!
